name: PiPedal
desc: Built and programmed a guitar pedal and it's own online application. Uses neural networks to detect external sound effects and replicate them.

name: CATBooks
desc: Built a book-sharing website where users can post books and add reviews/comments. Calculates ratings, stores user data using MySQL, and features top performing books

name: Battleship
desc: Created a Battleship simulator game using Java. Game is played through the console against a basic AI.

name: ROBLOX Video Games
desc: Used lua to create a number of multiplayer videogames on ROBLOX. Several of these were personal projects and others were part of large teams; several of these have gone on to garner several million players and have generated thousands of dollars in revenue.
